snippet: A concert at Le Poisson Rouge feature Gallic-inflected sounds and live painting.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by violinist Harumi Rhodes, pianist Molly Morkoski, cellist Caroline Stinson and visual artist Makoto Fujimura at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: A concert at Le Poisson Rouge feature Gallic-inflected sounds and live painting.

headline.seo: ‘Luminance of Color,’ French Accent at Le Poisson Rouge
headline.main: A French Color Palette Takes in the Eye and Ear
headline.print_headline: A French Color Palette Takes in the Eye and Ear
